## Feature Description
A clear description of what you'd like added.

## Why This Helps
How would this feature help the campaign or users?

## Proposed Solution
If you have ideas on how to implement this.

## Alternatives Considered
Any alternative solutions you've thought of.

## Additional Context
Screenshots, mockups, or other relevant info.
